name: based aura
description: it's about based aura. aura. energy. carrying your aura and cleansing it to become the best version of yourself. pushing yourself to new heights. creating an energy field around you that can be sensed by others. it's a beautiful thing to carry such energy and such an aura especially when it's based. we need more based people in this world, meaning like genuine, caring, generous, do good for the less fortunate and what not.
